author: Caitlin Owens
title: Employers bear the brunt of reopening
description: Even if some states and the federal government begin encouraging people to go back to work, employers ultimately will make the decision about when to bring their workers back to the office, and what that looks like. Why it matters: There’s no playbook for the…
content:
Even if some states and the federal government begin encouraging people to go back to work, employers ultimately will make the decision about when to bring their workers back to the office, and what that looks like.
